generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road surface with white lane markings and a crosswalk, indicating it is a road.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible along the right side of the road, bordered by a curb and adjacent to a building.
- building: Several buildings are visible in the background and on the right side of the image, including storefronts and residential structures.
- pole: A traffic light pole and a stop sign pole are visible in the image.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible, showing a green light.
- traffic sign: A stop sign and a triangular yield sign are visible.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the street and in front of the buildings.
- person: A person is standing on the sidewalk near the traffic light.
- bus: A tram (a type of rail vehicle) is visible, which is a form of public transport bus.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible parked on the left side of the image.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible parked on the left side of the image.
- car: The front of a car is visible at the bottom of the image.
